page.title: 07The Village Garden Fete.
page.content: They are always super events. This year, the fete raised approximately five hundred pounds for the church. It was very hot on the day,and I don't think that the people were feeling very energetic as they just walked around not doing much. The ice-creams did well though! Stalls included White Elephant,Books, Cakes (Home Produce), Lucky Dip, Nearly New Jumble and Tombola. Of course there was Golf , Bowling, Ice-creams and Refreshments. It is a really great time out. There is a pond in the back garden of the Manor, which is shady , and you could walk around it.
